item.title: Genealogies: Ttono wo (who was killed by a rhinoceros)
item.summary: ||kabbo's maternal grandfather Ttono wo was killed by an adult rhinoceros. The names of some of Ttono wo's children are listed, with details of their personal history.
item.comments: 1) p.476v: ||kabbo's uncle (and father-in-law) â‰ khuagen's name means 'little thorn bush', 2) This is found in Book III-1
item.author: unknown
